15. Mark Cuban - He is an entrepreneur, investor, and owner of the Dallas Mavericks. His website, blogmaverick.com, features insights on business, technology, and personal development.
16. Keith Rabois - He is an entrepreneur, investor, and COO of Square. His website keithrabois.com features insights on startups, technology, and personal development.
17. Marc Andreessen - He is a venture capitalist, entrepreneur, and co-founder of Andreessen Horowitz. His website, blog.pmarca.com, features insights on startups, technology, and investing.
18. Sam Altman - He is an entrepreneur, startup advisor, and president of Y Combinator. His website, blog.samaltman.com, features insights on startups, technology, and personal development.
19. Adam Grant - He is an organizational psychologist, author, and Wharton Professor. His website, adamgrant.net, features insights on organizational behavior, leadership, and personal development.
20. Malcolm Gladwell - He is a journalist, author, and speaker. His website, gladwell.com, features insights on a wide range of topics, including business, psychology, and personal development.

These channels and personalities are known for their insights on business, technology, and personal development, and they often feature interviews with successful entrepreneurs and business leaders, as well as insights on startups, technology, investing, and personal development. They also have their personal websites where they share their thoughts and ideas.
